ec17f8da624511b8d1a7e14df","dweb:/ipfs/QmeJQCtZrQjtJLr6u7ZHWeH3pBnjtLWzvRrKViAi7UZqxL"]},"src/contracts/PriceFeedManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa181414d67aa2849c39239368c792e3920bc0747ed25f2c06496395f2b0f2202","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2f0bc34123e635726ecec752841e2287a139fec538a2bb7e1554c57818f9a8b4","dweb:/ipfs/QmS9XPU5Ybi4KxVNxECbJ7ByRs24VJP7rdF6A7a2wWacPC"]},"src/interfaces/IAggregatorV3.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2bf7167bb2d0469a051c38d3959f9791ec0d90c45e1da3b1d011b02ff619b9e7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://dbcaf48cda36506924d962c90d4ba9108da91837f3e5a45339ffa0869277be15","dweb:/ipfs/QmTcCwCjfUssNtSCSg8W1qi1rtzXbePAgQmNyEBiQMMn1r"]}},"version":1}

returns.decimals: The number of decimals in the price

returns.updatedAt: The timestamp of the last update

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.heartbeat: The maximum time between updates in seconds

convertLocalToUSDC(uint8,uint256).notice: Convert local currency amount to USDC

convertUSDCToLocal(uint8,uint256).notice: Convert USDC amount to local currency

getLatestPrice(uint8).notice: Get the latest price for a currency pair

isPriceFeedActive(uint8).notice: Check if a price feed is active

priceFeeds(uint8).notice: Mapping from currency pair to price feed

setPriceFeed(uint8,address,uint256).notice: Set a price feed for a currency pair
